levels.description: After deployment, Talent 1's range expands; Crownslayer disappears within the smoke, gaining <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> and her Block becomes 0; every <@ba.vup>{attack@times}</>s, she will appear and deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale_s3:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage twice to a ground enemy within the smoke and <$ba.stun>Stun</> them for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</>s (a single target can only be targeted once every <@ba.vup>{mark_duration}</>s)
